# The Entente: Battlefields WW1

|released =
|genre = Real-time strategy
|modes = Single-player, multiplayer
|platforms = Microsoft Windows
}}
The Entente: Battlefields WW1 (; also known as World War I: The Great War) is a real-time strategy video game developed by Lesta Studio and published in 2003 by Buka Entertainment. A Western version was released by Encore, Inc. in 2004. It simulates World War I from the perspective of the five main combatants: Russia, France, Germany, Britain and the Austrian-Hungarian Empire, focusing on economy and military paths to victory.
| GSpot = 4.8/10
| IGN = 6.4/10
| JXV= 8/20
